00029 #ifndef _MUX_H_
00030 #define _MUX_H_
00031 
00032 #include "in1out.h"
00033 #include "queue.h"
00034 
00035 
00036 typedef struct
00037 {
00038    data *pdata;
00039    int inp;
00040 } inpstruct;
00041 
00042 //tolua_begin
00043 class mux: public in1out
00044 {
00045       typedef in1out baseclass;
00046 
00047    public:
00048       mux():event_each(this, 0)
00049       {
00050 //         event_each = new event(this, 0);
00051          doParseBufSiz = TRUE; // turn on parsing buffer size by init()
00052          // can be changed by constructors of derived
00053          // classes, e.g. muxWFQ
00054       }
00055       ~mux();
00056       int act(void);
00057 //      int cmd(char*);
00058       int getLoss(int i) { return this->lost[i - 1];}
00059       int getLossVCI(int i) { return this->lostVCI[i];}
00060       int getLossTot(void) { return this->lossTot;}
00061       void resLoss(void);
00062       int getNinp(void) { return this->ninp;}
00063       int getMaxVCI(void) { return this->max_vci;}
00064       void setMaxVCI(int maxvci) {this->max_vci = maxvci;}
00065 //tolua_end
00066       void early(event *);
00067       void late(event *);
00068       rec_typ REC(data *, int); // REC is a macro normally expanding to rec (for debugging)
00069       int export(exp_typ *);
00070       void dropItem(inpstruct *);
00071 
00072        // public members
00073 //tolua_begin
00074       int ninp;    // # of inputs
00075       int max_vci;
00076       queue q;   // system queue
00077 //tolua_end
00078         
00079       event event_each;   // event for the late() method (called in each slot)
00080 
00081       int doParseBufSiz;   // TRUE: parse the buffer size in init()
00082       // can be turned off by derived classes, e.g. muxWFQ
00083 
00084       unsigned int *lost;   /* one loss counter per input line */
00085       unsigned int *lostVCI;  // loss counter per VC
00086       unsigned lossTot;  // total losses
00087 
00088       inpstruct *inp_buff;  /* buffer for cells arriving in the early slot phase */
00089       inpstruct *inp_ptr;  /* current position in inp_buff */
00090 }; //tolua_export
00091 
00092 #endif // _MUX_H_
